titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter sent from the Commissioners of the Church of Scotland, to the severall Presbyteries and provinciall assemblies in Scotland: giving them warning of the dangerous designes of evill affected men, against the church and cause of God.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith, at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange
